column4: pl tell me if i finished instal programs with Synaptic where it goes because i cant find it:(
Clam AV is not a gui app
ClamAV is a background daemon that you configure and initialize from the command line
or install Sun's JRE and then use Frostwire
Frostwire is no longer in the repos
sun's jre and gtk-gnutella are there, though
open a terminal and type "gtk-gnutella" (no quotes)
you have three menus. "Applications," "Places," and "System." using logic, what menu would you expect to contain your applications?
you just said the app would not start
now you say you can;t see the icon in the menu.
come to eLiberatica in Brasov in May. :)
conference about free/open source software and Romania
